creator: sledru@mozilla.com

comments.text:
This bug was filed from the Socorro interface and is 
report bp-ecdbc938-b655-44c4-9500-3fd770170531.
=============================================================

Opening a xsls in Google doc. Unfortunately, as this is confidential information, I cannot share the doc to reproduce but this is reproducible.

I can help debugging if needed.

In the term, I see (not sure it is related)

$ Failed to open curl lib from binary, use libcurl.so instead
ExceptionHandler::GenerateDump cloned child 1429
ExceptionHandler::SendContinueSignalToChild sent continue signal to child
ExceptionHandler::WaitForContinueSignal waiting for continue signal...
Failed to open curl lib from binary, use libcurl.so instead
Sandbox: Unexpected EOF, op 0 flags 01101 path /tmp/GeckoChildCrash1373.extra

Backtrace:

comments.text: Sylvestre, since this is reproducible for you, would you mind using mozregression to find where we started crashing on this?
comments.author: cam@mcc.id.au

comments.text:
Sure but you know the murphy law right? I cannot reproduce it anymore :(
my other report is bp-91def8fa-bbad-4c76-b730-c2b380170531
